3. NA vs 0

NA occurs when a carrier has NA values for distance and 0 occurs when there is no variation in distance values for a carrier.

NA value

flights |>
  filter(carrier == "OO" & month == 1) |>
  summarise(sd_dist = sd(distance, na.rm = TRUE))
# A tibble: 1 × 1
  sd_dist
    <dbl>
1      NA

0 value

flights |>
  filter(carrier == "YV" & month == 1) |>
  summarise(sd_dev = sd(distance, na.rm = TRUE))
# A tibble: 1 × 1
  sd_dev
   <dbl>
1      0

4. Constructed Dataframe

flights |>
  group_by(month, carrier) |>
  summarise(avg_delay = mean(dep_delay, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = carrier,
    values_from = avg_delay
  )
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'month'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.

5. Proportion of delayed flights

flights |>
  filter(dep_delay > 0 & arr_delay <= 0) |>
  summarise(proportion = n() / nrow(flights))
# A tibble: 1 × 1
  proportion
       <dbl>
1      0.105

Q6

#Identify routes that more than one airline flies
flights |> 
  group_by(origin, dest) |>
  summarise(numAirline = n_distinct(carrier)) |>
  filter(numAirline > 1) |>
  arrange(numAirline)
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'origin'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
# A tibble: 128 × 3
# Groups:   origin [3]
   origin dest  numAirline
   <chr>  <chr>      <int>
 1 EWR    AUS            2
 2 EWR    BDL            2
 3 EWR    BNA            2
 4 EWR    BWI            2
 5 EWR    CHS            2
 6 EWR    CLE            2
 7 EWR    CVG            2
 8 EWR    DCA            2
 9 EWR    DEN            2
10 EWR    DFW            2
# ℹ 118 more rows

#Average arrival delay
mean_arr_delay_tbl <- flights |> 
  group_by(carrier, origin, dest) |>
  summarise(mean_arr_delay = mean(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE))
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'carrier', 'origin'. You can override using
the `.groups` argument.
mean_airline <-  mean_arr_delay_tbl |>
  left_join(airlines, by = "carrier")

print(mean_airline)
# A tibble: 439 × 5
# Groups:   carrier, origin [35]
   carrier origin dest  mean_arr_delay name             
   <chr>   <chr>  <chr>          <dbl> <chr>            
 1 9E      EWR    ATL            -6.25 Endeavor Air Inc.
 2 9E      EWR    CVG             1.40 Endeavor Air Inc.
 3 9E      EWR    DTW             2.54 Endeavor Air Inc.
 4 9E      EWR    MSP             1.60 Endeavor Air Inc.
 5 9E      JFK    ATL             1.40 Endeavor Air Inc.
 6 9E      JFK    AUS            -3.5  Endeavor Air Inc.
 7 9E      JFK    BNA            10.2  Endeavor Air Inc.
 8 9E      JFK    BOS             5.66 Endeavor Air Inc.
 9 9E      JFK    BUF             6.67 Endeavor Air Inc.
10 9E      JFK    BWI             8.73 Endeavor Air Inc.
# ℹ 429 more rows
#best and worse avg delay
perfromance_tbl <- mean_airline |>
  group_by(origin, dest) |>
  summarise(
    best = carrier[which.min(mean_arr_delay)],
    best_time = min(mean_arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE),
    worst = carrier[which.max(mean_arr_delay)],
    worst_time = max(mean_arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE)
  )
print(perfromance_tbl)
# A tibble: 223 × 6
# Groups:   origin, dest [223]
   origin dest  best  best_time worst worst_time
   <chr>  <chr> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>      <dbl>
 1 EWR    ALB   EV        14.4  EV         14.4 
 2 EWR    ANC   UA        -2.5  UA         -2.5 
 3 EWR    ATL   9E        -6.25 EV         19.5 
 4 EWR    AUS   WN       -11.2  UA          4.28
 5 EWR    AVL   EV         8.80 EV          8.80
 6 EWR    BDL   EV         6.78 UA         22.6 
 7 EWR    BNA   WN        -2.13 EV         17.7 
 8 EWR    BOS   EV        -4.01 B6          6.87
 9 EWR    BQN   UA        10.9  UA         10.9 
10 EWR    BTV   EV        12.2  EV         12.2 
# ℹ 213 more rows
#Dff bw times
time_diff_tbl <- perfromance_tbl |>
  summarise(
    diff_bw = best_time - worst_time
  )

print(time_diff_tbl)
# A tibble: 223 × 3
# Groups:   origin [3]
   origin dest  diff_bw
   <chr>  <chr>   <dbl>
 1 EWR    ALB       0  
 2 EWR    ANC       0  
 3 EWR    ATL     -25.8
 4 EWR    AUS     -15.5
 5 EWR    AVL       0  
 6 EWR    BDL     -15.8
 7 EWR    BNA     -19.8
 8 EWR    BOS     -10.9
 9 EWR    BQN       0  
10 EWR    BTV       0  
# ℹ 213 more rows
#greatest time diff was for route JFK - ATL

# Identifying missing entries in columns
data_Corr <- data_given |> 
  drop_na() |>
  mutate(disease_status = case_when(
    disease_status == "Healthy" ~ "healthy",
    TRUE ~disease_status
  )) |>
  mutate(gender = case_when(
    gender == "femal" ~ "female",
    TRUE ~ gender
  ))
    
data_Corr
